__TOC__

== About ==
 This page started October 31, 2011 by <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Kaulbach|Michael Kaulbach]]</nowiki> for the purpose of working on the cleanup of <nowiki>[[http://ubottu.com/factoids.cgi|Ubottu's factoids]]</nowiki> as mentioned in part by a request in the #ubuntu-irc mailing-list, <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-irc/2011-October/001406.html|"New roles in the Ubuntu IRC team"]]</nowiki>

== Objectives ==
- Remove obsolete factoids <<BR>>
- Update outdated factoids <<BR>>
- List factoid candidates <<BR>>
- Tidy up factoid aliases <<BR>>
- Provide a collaborative method of factoid review and updates <<BR>>

== Methodology ==
(as of Nov 2, 2011) <<BR>>
==== Under the heading "Candidates For Removal", sections containing: ====
Factoid name (including aliases), Factoid content, Reason (please include your name), Notes/Actions taken (please include your name)<<BR>>
Sample Criteria: Factoids with obsolete information, inaccurate information, potentially harmful, and cannot or will not be updated.
==== Under the heading "Candidates For Update", sections containing: ====
Factoid name (including aliases), Factoid content, Reason/Proposed update (please include your name), Notes/Actions taken (please include your name)<<BR>>
Sample Criteria: Factoids with useful but outdated information, with typographical errors, broken links, could be made more succinct or verbose.<<BR>>

==== Under the heading "Candidates For Inclusion", sections containing: ====
Proposed factoid name (including aliases), Proposed content, Reasoning (please include your name), Notes/Actions taken (please include your name)<<BR>>
Sample Criteria: Factoids which do not yet exist but possibly should.<<BR>>

The table format for headings is currently:<<BR>>
<code>||<|2:10%>Name||<|2:30%>Content||<|2:30%>Reason/Proposal, Name||<|2:30%>Notes/Action, Name||</code>

==== Under the heading "Remarks:" ====
Comments regarding anything which does not fit under the above described headings.<<BR>>
